translations.translation: when the wild beasts are all herded together,
The wild beasts stampede on the run,
when the savage beasts shall be brought together,
the wild beasts are herded together,
And when wild animals are herded together.
And when the wild beasts are gathered together.
And when the wild animals are made to go forth,
when the savage beasts shall be mustered,
And when the wild beasts are herded together,
and when all beasts are gathered together,
And when the wild beasts shall be gathered together,
when the wild beasts are mustered,
When the wild beasts are herded together (in the human habitations);
And when the wild beasts shall be gathered together;
when the savage beasts are gathered
When the beasts are gathered.
And when the wild beasts are gathered
[81:5] and when the wild beasts are mustered, [when they are] brought together after being resurrected so that each of them may retaliate against the other, before becoming dust;
(And when the wild beasts are herded together) for retaliation; and it is also said this means: when they are dead,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَإِذَا ٱلْوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتْ } معناه مَاتَتْ

translations.translation: And when the beasts are gathered, it means they have died.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَإِذَا ٱلْوُحُوشُ } أي: النفوس المستوحشة الأبية، الوحشية التائهة في بوادي الطبيعة، وقفر الهيولي { حُشِرَتْ } [التكوير: 5] وجمعت إلى ما منه انتشرت وبدت

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { وإِذا الوحوشُ حُشِرت } أي: جُمعت من كل جانب، وقيل: بُعثت للقصاص، قال قتادة: يُحشر كلُّ شيءٍ حتى الذباب للقصاص، فإذا قضى بينها رُدّت تراباً، فلا يبقى منها إلاّ ما فيه سرور لبني آدم، كالطاووس ونحوه
